Rule.Name: StereotypeInLegalModelOnly
Rule.Description: Legal: The "Permission", "Obligation", "No", and "Consequence" stereotypes must be referenced in at least one "Legal" diagram
Rule.Constraint: let s:String = self.getMetadata('ST_Legal') in (s='Obligation' or s='Permission' or s='No' or s='Consequence') implies self.isInLegalDiagram()

Rule.Name: LegalStereotypesNotForActors
Rule.Description: Legal: The "Permission", "Obligation", "No", and "Consequence" stereotypes are for intentional elements only
Rule.Constraint: let s:String = self.getMetadata('ST_Legal') in (s<>'Obligation' and s<>'Permission' and s<>'No' and s<>'Consequence')

Rule.Name: ObligationNotDecomposableByNo
Rule.Description: Legal: An "Obligation" intentional element must not be And-decomposed by a "No" element
Rule.Constraint: let ieSrc:grl::IntentionalElement=dest.oclAsType(IntentionalElement), ieDest:grl::IntentionalElement=src.oclAsType(IntentionalElement), s:String = ieSrc.getMetadata('ST_Legal') in (s='Obligation' and ieSrc.decompositionType=grl::DecompositionType::And) implies ieDest.getMetadata('ST_Legal') <> 'No'

Rule.Name: ObligationDecomposableByAndOnly
Rule.Description: Legal: An "Obligation" intentional element must be And-decomposed
Rule.Constraint: let st:String = getMetadata('ST_Legal') in (st = 'Obligation') implies self.decompositionType=DecompositionType::And

Rule.Name: TracesLinksBetweenActors
Rule.Description: Legal: A "traces" URN link must be between two actors or two intentional elements
Rule.Constraint: self.getLinksToForType('traces') -> forAll (a | a.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Actor) and a <> self)

Rule.Name: TracesLinksBetweenIEs
Rule.Description: Legal: A "traces" URN link must be between two actors or two intentional elements
Rule.Constraint: self.getLinksToForType('traces') -> forAll (ie | ie.oclIsTypeOf(grl::IntentionalElement) and ie <> self)

Rule.Name: TracesLinksFromOrgToLegalActors
Rule.Description: Legal: "traces" URN links must go from the organization model to the legal model
Rule.Constraint: self.getLinksToForType('traces') -> forAll (a | a.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Actor) implies not(self.isInLegalDiagram()) and a.oclAsType(grl::Actor).isInLegalDiagram() )

Rule.Name: TracesLinksFromOrgToLegalIEs
Rule.Description: Legal: "traces" URN links must go from the organization model to the legal model
Rule.Constraint: self.getLinksToForType('traces') -> forAll (a | a.oclIsTypeOf(grl::IntentionalElement) implies not(self.isInLegalDiagram()) and a.oclAsType(grl::IntentionalElement).isInLegalDiagram() )

Rule.Name: ConsequenceContribFromLegalToOrg
Rule.Description: Legal: Only GRL contributions from "Consequence" IEs can go from the legal model to the organization model
Rule.Constraint: let srcIE:grl::IntentionalElement = src.oclAsType(grl::IntentionalElement) in (srcIE.isInLegalDiagram() and srcIE.getMetadata('ST_Legal') <> 'Consequence') implies dest.oclAsType(grl::IntentionalElement).isInLegalDiagram()

Rule.Name: ConsequenceContribPositive
Rule.Description: Legal: GRL contributions from "Consequence" IEs must be positive
Rule.Constraint: src.oclAsType(grl::IntentionalElement).getMetadata('ST_Legal') = 'Consequence' implies self.quantitativeContribution >= 0

Rule.Name: ConsequenceUnused
Rule.Description: Legal: "Consequence" intentional element has no contribution to the organization model
Rule.Constraint: self.getMetadata('ST_Legal') = 'Consequence' implies self.linksSrc -> select (link | link.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Contribution)) -> collect (link | link.oclAsType(grl::Contribution)) -> select (c | c.dest.oclIsTypeOf(grl::IntentionalElement) and not(c.dest.oclAsType(grl::IntentionalElement).isInLegalDiagram()) )-> size() > 0

Rule.Name: LegalIEinitialized
Rule.Description: Legal: A strategy should not initialize intentional elements from a Legal model
Rule.Constraint: self.evaluations.intElement -> forAll( ie | not(ie.isInLegalDiagram() and ie.name <> 'DefaultNonComp') )

Rule.Name: ConsequenceWithMinus100Contrib
Rule.Description: Legal: "Consequence" IEs must have a -100 contribution from DefaultNonComp
Rule.Constraint: self.getMetadata('ST_Legal') = 'Consequence' implies self.linksDest -> select (link | link.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Contribution)) -> collect (link | link.oclAsType(grl::Contribution)) -> one (c | c.quantitativeContribution = -100 and c.src.oclIsTypeOf(grl::IntentionalElement) and c.src.oclAsType(grl::IntentionalElement).name = 'DefaultNonComp' )

Rule.Name: ConsequenceDependOnDefaultMaxEval
Rule.Description: Legal: "Consequence" IEs must have a dependency to DefaultMaxEval
Rule.Constraint: self.getMetadata('ST_Legal') = 'Consequence' implies self.linksDest -> select (link | link.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Dependency)) -> collect (link | link.oclAsType(grl::Dependency)) -> one (d | d.src.oclIsTypeOf(grl::IntentionalElement) and d.src.oclAsType(grl::IntentionalElement).name = 'DefaultMaxEval' )

Rule.Name: DefaultNonCompSetTo100
Rule.Description: Legal: DefaultNonComp must be a resource evaluated to 100 in the Legal model
Rule.Constraint: self.name = 'DefaultNonComp' implies type=IntentionalElementType::Ressource and isInLegalDiagram() and (getNumEval() = 100 or getNumEval() = -1000)

Rule.Name: DefaultMaxEvalSetToZero
Rule.Description: Legal: DefaultMaxEval must be a resource evaluated to 0 in the Legal model
Rule.Constraint: self.name = 'DefaultMaxEval' implies type=IntentionalElementType::Ressource and isInLegalDiagram() and (getNumEval() = 0 or getNumEval() = -1000)

Rule.Name: NonComplianceOnTracesIEs
Rule.Description: Legal: The source of the "traces" URN link does not comply with its destination
Rule.Constraint: self.getLinksToForType('traces') -> forAll (ie | ie.oclIsTypeOf(grl::IntentionalElement) implies self.getNumEval() <= ie.getNumEval() )

Rule.Name: NonComplianceOnTracesActors
Rule.Description: Legal: The source of the "traces" URN link does not comply with its destination
Rule.Constraint: self.getLinksToForType('traces') -> forAll (a | a.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Actor) implies self.getNumEval() <= a.getNumEval() )

Rule.Name: ObligationFullySatisfied
Rule.Description: Legal: Non-compliance: an "Obligation" must be evaluated to 100
Rule.Constraint: self.getMetadata('ST_Legal') = 'Obligation' implies (getNumEval() = 100 or getNumEval() = -1000)

Rule.Name: PermissionFullySatisfied
Rule.Description: Legal: Non-compliance: a "Permission" with non-"No" children must be evaluated to 100
Rule.Constraint: self.getMetadata('ST_Legal') = 'Permission' implies ( (self.linksDest -> select (link | link.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Decomposition)) -> collect (link | link.oclAsType(grl::Decomposition)) -> exists (d | d.src.oclIsTypeOf(grl::IntentionalElement) and d.src.oclAsType(grl::IntentionalElement).getMetadata('ST_Legal') <> 'No') ) implies (self.getNumEval() = 100 or self.getNumEval() = -1000) )
